backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that all '0% tax' and equivalent phrasing was removed from frontend components, with high confidence and evidence pointing to TickerBanner.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and notable changes such as removed tax references, links, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file that defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app titled 'The Pointless Coin', mounting the app at the #root div and loading the main TSX entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full page layout by rendering Navigation, HeroSection, TickerBanner, AboutSection, TokenomicsSection, HowToBuySection, CommunitySection, and Footer in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column section introducing The Pointless Coin with humorous meme-coin copy, a floating coin image with orbiting badges, and tag pills emphasizing no utility or promises.
frontend/src/components/CommunitySection: Community section featuring a single X Community social card linking to the Pointless Army X community, plus a large CTA banner with a floating coin image and Buy/Join buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, quick-link navigation, a single X social icon, a financial disclaimer, dynamic copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution line.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing page hero section with a floating coin image, animated star particles, headline, ticker symbol, tagline, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections.
Displays a three-step guide (create Phantom wallet, swap SOL for $POINTLESS, hold) with icons, descriptions, and tips for purchasing the token.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware background, smooth-scroll nav links, a buy CTA button, and a collapsible mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapSection.t: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/TickerBanner.tsx: Horizontally scrolling marquee banner displaying repeated promotional phrases for $POINTLESS in a gold-styled ticker strip.
frontend/src/components/TokenomicsSectio: Shows tokenomics stats (1B supply, 0% team allocation) as cards, plus a copyable contract address, with gold-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/TweetBanner.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, delegation validity, and exposing identity state and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for a dark/gold theme using oklch colors, and provides utility classes for gold glows, buttons, cards, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom oklch-based color tokens (gold, dark), display/heading font families, gold box-shadow utilities, and keyframe animations for accordion, coin float, and pulse-glow effects.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 17) describing the build goal — a Solana-based meme coin website called 'The Pointless Coin' — along with architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features.
